Introduction

Kim Donghan is a South Korean singer under OUI Entertainment. In 2017, he appeared in the second season of the boy group survival program "Produce 101 Season 2." Although he was eliminated, Donghan still managed to debut as a member of the temporary project boy group JBJ. After JBJ disbanded, he made his official solo debut in 2018 with the mini-album "D-Day."

In 2020, it was announced that Donghan would debut again, this time as the lead vocalist and main dancer of the boy group WEi. He debuted with WEi in October 2020 with the mini-album "Identity: First Sight."
